hero.title: Learn, train, and master
hero.subtitle: Table Tennis while having fun
hero.description: Join Club Esportiu Joventut and unleash your potential. From beginners to champions, we train them all.

about.title: Who We Are
about.description: The Club Esportiu Joventut TT promotes social inclusion through table tennis in Sant Josep de sa Talaia. This year, we are launching extracurricular activities at CP L’Urgell, bringing the sport closer to children, youth, seniors, and people with disabilities. Our goal: to foster health, social connection, and personal development in an accessible and motivating environment.
about.excellenceDesc: Striving for the highest standards in training and competition
about.communityDesc: Building lasting friendships and supporting each other
about.storyP1: Club Esportiu Joventut was born from a simple vision: to create a space where table tennis enthusiasts of all levels could come together, learn, and grow. What started as a small group of passionate players in 1995 has evolved into one of the region's most respected table tennis institutions.
about.storyP2: Our founders, former national champions Sarah and Michael Chen, believed that table tennis was more than just a sport—it was a way to build character, discipline, and lifelong friendships. This philosophy continues to guide us today.
about.storyP3: Over the years, we've produced numerous regional and national champions, but we're equally proud of the recreational players who've found joy, fitness, and community within our walls.
about.valuesDesc: These core principles guide everything we do at Club Esportiu Joventut

trainings.title: Training Programs
trainings.description: Discover the training program that best fits your level and availability. At Club Esportiu Joventut TT in Sant Josep de sa Talaia, we offer table tennis sessions of 1 hour and 30 minutes, designed to improve your technique, physical condition, and game confidence. Choose your plan and start enjoying motivating, inclusive, and effective training.
trainings.mainProgramsDesc: Choose the program that matches your skill level and commitment
trainings.beginnerDesc: Start table tennis at your own pace, with full motivation.
trainings.competitionDesc: Feel the progress week by week and level up your game.
trainings.adultsDesc: Train intensely and reach your best version.
trainings.specialProgramsDesc: Additional training options for specific needs
trainings.youthDesc: Specialized program for young talents aged 8-16
trainings.flexSchedule: Choose the schedule that best suits you from the available sessions (flexible)
trainings.improve: Improve your technique, coordination, and fitness
trainings.completeTraining: Complete training with technical, tactical, and physical work
